visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-filter: blur(12px); background: rgba(10, 10, 10, 0.7); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
visual_enhancers.scanlines: background: repeating-linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(0,0,0,0.15), rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 1px, transparent 1px, transparent 2px);
visual_enhancers.gradients: No full screen gradients. Use radial-gradient(circle at top right, rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.05), transparent 40%) for subtle depth.

Card.style: Flat obsidian background (#0A0A0A) with 1px border (#FFFFFF/10). No shadow by default. Hover: Border becomes Primary (#00E5FF/30).

Button.primary: bg-[#00E5FF] text-black font-bold hover:bg-[#33EBFF] shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(0,229,255,0.3)] rounded-sm uppercase tracking-wider
Button.secondary: border border-[#FFFFFF/20] text-white hover:border-[#FFFFFF/50] hover:bg-[#FFFFFF/5] rounded-sm uppercase tracking-wider

Table.style: Compact density. Header: text-xs uppercase tracking-widest text-muted. Rows: border-b border-[#FFFFFF/5] hover:bg-[#FFFFFF/2]. Font: JetBrains Mono for all numbers.

Badge.style: rounded-full px-2 py-0.5 text-[10px] font-mono uppercase tracking-wide border border-current bg-opacity-10

layout_strategies.dashboard_grid: Bento Mode B: High Density. grid-cols-12 gap-4. Widgets must stretch (h-full).
layout_strategies.scanner_layout: Split View: Left Sidebar (Filters, w-64, flex-shrink-0) + Right Content (Data Grid, flex-1).
layout_strategies.newsletter_layout: Editorial Single Column: max-w-2xl mx-auto. Serif typography. Paper-like background (#0F0F0F).

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -10 }}
motion.ticker_tape: Continuous linear loop for stock quotes.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Manrope' for all UI text and 'JetBrains Mono' for all financial data.
Implement the 'Dark Citadel' theme: #050505 background, not default slate.
For the Dashboard, use a dense Bento Grid (Mode B). No wasted space.
The 'Morning Newsletter' must feel like a distinct 'paper' experience (Serif fonts).
Use 'recharts' for data visualization. Style them with minimal axes and neon strokes.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
